definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
to collect local cultural material (recording folk songs, taking photos etc)

sentences.english: A biological worker always makes it a point to record the time when a specimen in collected .
sentences.chinese: 生物工作者必定记下采得标本的时间。

sentences.english: He likes sports very much, so he looks strong and young.
sentences.chinese: 他特别喜欢体育，所以看起采既年轻又强壮。
观众向那个演员喝倒采。

sentences.english: Problems of postharvest treatment which were still existed were discussed too.
sentences.chinese: 同时对果品采后处理存在的问题进行了说明。

sentences.english: Opening model on precision heavy duty installation. Essy to save and repair.
sentences.chinese: 油压装置采开放式，易保养及维修。

sentences.english: Seize the day. Gather ye rosebuds while ye may. Why does the writer use these lines?
sentences.chinese: “及时采拮你的花蕾”，为什么作者要写这几句话？
采葡萄的工人已经走了。

sentences.english: Single knock-out system will be adopted for each event.
sentences.chinese: 每项赛事均采单淘汰制。

sentences.english: He had struckoil in Persia, but not in the quantities he had hoped.
sentences.chinese: 他已经在波斯采到石油，但质量并非如其所原。

sentences.english: The money will go to finance a new community centre.
sentences.chinese: 这些钱将用采资助一个新社区中心。

sentences.english: Early in the morning, the lawyer and his Czechoslovakian friend went out to pick berries for their morning breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，律师和他的朋友去外面采早饭吃的浆果。

sentences.english: Darling, I won’t pick the flower, however charming it may be.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，无论鲜花可能多么迷人，我也不会去采。

sentences.english: The agency we are offering will be on a commission basis.
sentences.chinese: 我们所提出的代理业务采佣金制。

sentences.english: For two years I have been able to pick these beautiful flowers to decorate my master's table.
sentences.chinese: 这两年来，我可以采这些花来装饰主人的桌子。

sentences.english: I gathered many mushrooms after rain.
Stope ground pressure control is a key issue in an open stope mining process.
sentences.chinese: 采场地压控制是空场采矿法开采工艺的关键环节。

definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
all kinds of grass/all kinds of flora
